channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Graffiti on side of Council block, 10th February
item.description:
Graffiti is on the brick facade of the side of the pramsheds block at the end of Darwin Street. It is a council owned block and faces the park. This has been Reported before and marked complete, but it has not been removed. Pls can it be removed as people are adding to it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Darwin Street, Walworth, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flooding from sewers, 10th February
item.description:
Pavement flooding North of 60 Holden Road. Cause is 3 sewer manholes flooding in TfL owned wood North of Woodside Park station. Public Health Harvard if water is fouled. Energy hazard due to water flowing through electricity sub-station kerbside.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 60, Holden Road, Woodside Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegal loading with associated noise at all times of the day and night, 10th February
item.description:
At 208 Mare Street a commercial flower business has appeared. They take delivery from articulated Lorrie’s at all times of the day and night. The Lorrie’s park in the bus lane (underneath no loading at any time sign). The traffic and noise wakes my kids.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mare Street, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter everywhere down and around Hope Park, 10th February
item.description:
Constant litter on this street and the surrounding area - doesn’t get cleaned away. Hope Park and the surrounding council estate greens. Issue been ongoing for months but particularly bad the last 2 weeks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Weston Road, Plaistow, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped sofa been there since weekend, 10th February
item.description:
Rubbish continually dumped in that area. Dog poo all.ovwr the road

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Wenlock Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Selective parking enforcement, 10th February
item.description:
Ongoing selective parking enforcement in this location. A particular vehicle is parked in a 30-minute short-stay bay for extended periods every day without any enforcement action, while other vehicles in the same bays are issued PCNs and penalised. This inconsistent approach undermines public trust and prevents fair access to short-stay parking for residents, customers, and legitimate users. Please investigate why this specific vehicle is being repeatedly ignored, provide a clear explanation.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Plough Way, Rotherhithe, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping by wheelie bins, 10th February
item.description:
Fridge, mattress and pushchair left by wheelie bins. The fridge has been there for several weeks, council service didn’t pick it up last time they passed. The location is next to the bins next to Earth Hackney on Truman’s Road

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Salcombe Road, Hackney, London
